text.div:
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
patient-reported-discharge-90daysQuestionnairehttps://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/Questionnaire/PatientReportedNinetyDays#1.0.1
General-Information-ClinicalGeneral information1..1group
Patient-IDWhat is the patient's identification?1..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.id
FullName-ClinicalWhat is the patient's full name?1..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.name.first().given.join(' ') + ' ' + %patient.name.first().family
Demographic-FactorsDemographic Factors1..1group
LivingLocPostWhere are you living now?1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
LiveAlonePostDo you live alone now?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of Live Alone Pre-Stroke
Survival-Disease-ControlPatient-Reported Health Status1..1group
SmokeCess-StrokeSince your hospitalization for stroke, have you smoked tobacco or cigarettes?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
Patient-Reported-Health-StatusPatient-Reported Health Status1..1group
PostStrokeAmbAre you able to walk?1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation
PostStrokeToiletingDo you need help from anybody to go to the toilet?1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting
PostStrokeDressDid you need help with dressing/undressing prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)? 1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing
FeedingDo you need a tube for feeding? (For example: a nasogastric tube or a gastrostomy tube.)1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
CommunicDo you have problems with communication or understanding?1..1questionValue Set: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
PROMIS-10_Q01In general, would you say your health is:0..1group
PROMIS-10_Q01In general, would you say your health is:0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q02In general, would you say your quality of life is:0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q03In general, how would you rate your physical health?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q04In general, how would you rate your mental health, including your mood and your ability to think?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q05In general, how would you rate your satisfaction with your social activities and relationships?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q09rIn general, rate how well you carry out your usual social activities at home, at work and in your community, and responsibilities as a parent, child, spouse, employee, friend, etc.)0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q06To what extent are you able to carry out your everyday physical activities such as walking, climbing stairs, carrying groceries, or moving a chair?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Q10rIn the past 7 days, how often have you been bothered by emotional problems such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Qo8rIn the past 7 days, how would you rate your fatigue on average?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
PROMIS-10_Qo7rIn the past 7 days, how would you rate your pain on average?0..1questionValue Set: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire

Documentation for this format

extension.valueString: Patient information to pre-populate the form with

name: patient-reported-discharge-90days
title: Patient Reported Questionnaire 03 - 90 days post admission

item.text: General information
What is the patient's identification?
What is the patient's full name?
Demographic Factors

code.display: At home, with no community support
In an assisting living home in the community (senior's home)
In a rehabilitation hospital or skilled care facilities (SNIF, IRF, LTACH)
In long term care (nursing home, chronic care hospital)

item.text: Where are you living now?

code.display: No, I shared my household with a spouse/partner or another person (e.g. sibling, children, parents)

item.text: Do you live alone now?
Patient-Reported Health Status
Since your hospitalization for stroke, have you smoked tobacco or cigarettes?
Patient-Reported Health Status

code.display: Able to walk without help from another person with or without a device.
Able to walk with help from another person.

item.text: Are you able to walk?

code.display: I needed help to go to the toilet.

item.text: Do you need help from anybody to go to the toilet?

code.display: I could manage dressing/undressing without help.

item.text: Did you need help with dressing/undressing prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)?
Do you need a tube for feeding? (For example: a nasogastric tube or a gastrostomy tube.)
Do you have problems with communication or understanding?
In general, would you say your health is:
In general, would you say your health is:
In general, would you say your quality of life is:
In general, how would you rate your physical health?
In general, how would you rate your mental health, including your mood and your ability to think?
In general, how would you rate your satisfaction with your social activities and relationships?
In general, rate how well you carry out your usual social activities at home, at work and in your community, and responsibilities as a parent, child, spouse, employee, friend, etc.)
To what extent are you able to carry out your everyday physical activities such as walking, climbing stairs, carrying groceries, or moving a chair?
In the past 7 days, how often have you been bothered by emotional problems such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable?
In the past 7 days, how would you rate your fatigue on average?
In the past 7 days, how would you rate your pain on average?
